contentrichtext.text: {{For|other uses of the term|Globus (disambiguation)}} {{Unreferenced|date=June 2007}} {{Infobox company | name = | logo = [[Image:Globus Logo.PNG|200px]] | type = | genre = | foundation = | founder = | location_city = | location_country = | location = | locations = | area_served = | key_people = | industry = | products = | services = | market cap = | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | assets = | equity = | owner = | num_employees = | parent = | divisions = | subsid = | homepage = | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Globus''' is a [[Switzerland|Swiss]] [[department store]] company, with 13 department stores in [[Switzerland]]. The group, which also includes the Herren Globus chain of menswear stores and the Office World chain of office supplies stores, it is owned by Switzerland's largest retailer, [[Migros]]. Globus was founded in 1907 in [[Zurich]], and now has stores in all major Swiss cities. The chain sells mostly [[Luxury good|upscale]] goods, including [[clothing]], [[cosmetics]], [[jewelry]] and household supplies. The stores are also noted for their extensive [[Delicatessen#Delikatessen in Europe|delicatessen]] section, called Globus Delicatessa, and their former mascot, [[Globi]], the [[comic books]] about whom have been a fixture in the childhood of many Swiss. There are Globus department stores in: {{col-begin}} {{col-1-of-2}} *[[Basel]], [[Basel-City|BS]] *[[Bern]] (2 Department stores), [[Canton of Bern|BE]] *[[Chur]], [[Graubünden|GR]] *[[Geneva]] (2 Department stores), [[Canton of Geneva|GE]] *[[Lausanne]], [[Vaud|VD]] *[[Locarno]], [[Ticino|TI]] {{col-2-of-2}} *[[Lucerne]], [[Canton of Lucerne|LU]] *[[Neuchâtel]], [[Canton of Neuchâtel|NE]] *[[St. Gallen]], [[Canton of St. Gallen|SG]] *[[Zurich]] (2 Department stores), [[Canton of Zurich|ZH]] *The [[Glatt shopping centre]] in [[Wallisellen]], near [[Zurich]]. {{col-end}} == External links == *[http://www.globus.ch Official Web site] [[Category:Retail companies of Switzerland]] [[Category:Department stores]]
